Harvesters : OpenAlex

Data source

SoVisu+ OpenAlex Harvester fetches data from the OpenAlex API.

Supported identifiers

The following identifiers are handled by the harvester:

  • ORCID

Data conversion

OpenAlex document types are mapped to RDF classes following the table provided in CRISalid data model documentation.
